org.mobilesynergies.android.epic.service.remoteui
Class UiGenerator

java.lang.Object
  org.mobilesynergies.android.epic.service.remoteui.UiGenerator

public class UiGenerator
extends java.lang.Object

The class UIGenerator gets a ParameterMap as input and transforms it to a user interface that is displayed by an Activity. It also constructs a ParameterMap reading out the values on any submit action triggered by the user. Further it can handle partial updates to the ui when it receives (partial) updates from the server.

Method Detail

getValue

public org.mobilesynergies.epic.client.remoteui.Parameter getValue(java.lang.String key)
                                                            throws java.lang.Exception
Retrieves the value of one parameter from the user interface.

Parameters:
key - The key of the parameter.
Returns:
The Parameter associated with the given key. The parameter is of correct type. Null is returned if no view was initialized
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - If the parameter was not found an exception is thrown.

getValues

public org.mobilesynergies.epic.client.remoteui.ParameterMap getValues()
                                                                throws java.lang.Exception
Retrieves values for all Parameters from the current user interface.

Returns:
A ParameterMap containing all Parameters, or null if no view was initialized
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - If a was initialized but could not be retrieved from the view an exception is thrown.

initializeUi

public View initializeUi(Context c,
                         org.mobilesynergies.epic.client.remoteui.ParameterMap parameterMap)
Initializes the user interface from a given ParameterMap

Parameters:
c - The context used to initialize new views.
parameterMap - The ParameterMap that holds all parameters that need to be displayed to the user.
Returns:
A LinearLayout that contains a ScrollView with all necessary views.

setSubmitActionListener

public void setSubmitActionListener(SubmitActionListener submitActionListener)
A SubmitActionListener is called when a Parameter (that has the submit action hint set to true) was changed by the user.

Parameters:
submitActionListener - The SubmitActionListener to be called on subsequent submit actions.

              throws java.lang.Exception
